Articles.Content:
SO I got three idiots on a high G adventure. I completed the contract, but they are stuck in the game. Such as the astronaut complex.

Is there a way to remove them?

Send them out on a second high G lithobraking mission. 

It shouldn't hurt your rep, but I'd quick save first.....

If tourists hang around the Astronaut Center or VAB (waiting to be assigned as crew), there's either an uncompleted contract, or a bug.  If the contract they followed in has, in fact, been satisfied, then feel free to call Security (i.e. the cheat menu, Alt-F12) to politely escort them back to their hotel and, if necessary, the airport for the flight home.

2 hours ago, Zeiss Ikon said:

If tourists hang around the Astronaut Center or VAB (waiting to be assigned as crew), there's either an uncompleted contract, or a bug.  If the contract they followed in has, in fact, been satisfied, then feel free to call Security (i.e. the cheat menu, Alt-F12) to politely escort them back to their hotel and, if necessary, the airport for the flight home.

How to do that?
Better, edit our persistent file to turn them into something useful, like sci... er... pilots and engineers.

12 minutes ago, 5thHorseman said:

Better, edit our persistent file to turn them into something useful, like sci... er... pilots and engineers.

Ah good idea.
